DataElement.preferredName: Neurobehavioral Risk Taking Test Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the way the brain affects emotion, behavior, and learning. Some cancers or their treatment may cause neurobehavioral problems._Risk is the potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable. (from WIkipedia)_As pertains to a medication: ingest, inhale, instill, or inject._A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
